synopsis.text: It's time to join the lively journey of the 38-member idol group AGC38 in their short film, "Sorette Dakara ne!", inspired by their official song. Set in the bustling classrooms of Musashi Asahigaoka Girls' Academy, the story unfolds as the girls navigate through their daily lives. Meanwhile, Ayano's friends, including Nene and Reina, refuse to give up on their ailing companion. Despite the slim chances of success, they embark on a mission to persuade Ayano to undergo a life-saving operation, determined to restore her health and rekindle her spirit. Prepare for a heartwarming tale of friendship and perseverance in this engaging anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
